General.Name: Elite Advanced Laser Corp
General.Description: Elite Advanced Laser Corporation provides electronic manufacturing services in Taiwan. The company offers assembly and testing services for optoelectronic, optical information, and optical and RF communication devices; and sensor assembly and testing services. It also provides visible laser diodes. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 35, Chiau An Street, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 235
